channel.title: How to place an npc?
channel.description:
i want to put a npc in the "auto Spawn" i know about coordinates like : Y and X but, i must also put rangeX and rangeY were i find this?????
HELP ME!

item.title: How to place an npc?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

ok right the first co-ord is X spawn point and then Y spawn point the next two co ords are the upper co ords if you want the NPC to move so these would be co ords to the east and north and then you have co ords to the south and west which are the last two co ords

Read full topic
